overview:
Jeff Pullen is responsible for setting the companyâ€™s overall direction and driving the execution of key strategies for growth throughout the organization. Jeff has extensive experience in mergers and acquisitions, strategy innovation and operational excellence and contributes his deep expertise to the continued growth and development of AudienceScience as a powerful leader in the global online advertising industry.

Jeff Pullen has previously served as CEO, COO and CFO of a number of public and private companies, most recently as CEO of US Search, a people search and public records company. Prior to US Search, he was CEO of QFour Digital, which he formed in partnership with GTCR Golder Rauner, to pursue acquisitions in the online marketing services sector. Previously, he held several positions, including COO, at ValueClick, Inc. (VCLK), one of the worldâ€™s largest integrated online marketing companies, which he joined as a result of ValueClickâ€™s acquisition of Commission Junction, where he was CEO. Mr. Pullenâ€™s career also includes many years as a partner in the Financial Advisory Services practice of Coopers & Lybrand where he specialized in troubled company restructuring, mergers & acquisitions and litigation services.
